nodes.text: The Ursellin system was located in the Noolian sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. It shared its name with the "Ursellin Sun Jammer Race Fixings," a notable exploit of the con artist Janstren Brell and the criminal organization "Red & Black League."
The Ursellin system was established in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square Q-13.
